body:
Have a look here:

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main() {
    int n,num,flag;
    do{
    cout<<"Enter number";
    cin>>n;
    num = n;
    flag = 0;
    while(num>0)
    {
        if(num%10 == 2 || num%10 ==3)
        {
            flag = 1;
            break;
        }
        num = num/10;
    }
    }while(flag==1);
    return 0;
}
title: How to reject an integer if certain digits are not wanted
